mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_push_token (user_id, fcm_token, user_agent, subscribed) VALUES (#{userId}, #{token}, #{ua}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = VALUES(user_id), user_agent = VALUES(user_agent), subscribed = 1, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT fcm_token FROM user_push_token WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND subscribed = 1 ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1
